name: MAESTRO (itch) (Lolon, Leaf Let, Bellona Marigold)
description:
Your dream is to become a concert pianist, but the world is about to end. Finding time for your practice, your messy kitchen, your dead plants and your worried friends gets harder and harder, and you wonder if a single dream is all you can live for.

Maestro is a short slice-of-life game about life choices, relationships, artistic achievement and listening to dog poetry during the apocalypse.

This game was originally designed for the Game Jobs Parade 2020 game jam with the theme "Carpe Diem/Seize The Day", but we ultimately decided to take our time and release it separately!

Credits

  • Bellona et Pax (@ScarSnapdragon): 2D Art, additional writing
  • Leaf Let (@LetLeaf): Writing, music
  • Lolon (@Lolon_Online): 3D art, programming, music

Controls

  • A: move left
  • D: move right
  • E: interact
  • Mouse + left click: choose dialogue option
  • f11(windows), cntl+command+F (Mac): fullscreen
